extendedInfo.description: Welcome to the Wi-Fi Now application from U.S. CellularÂ® ! This is a free service that gives you access to the worldâs largest network of qualified Wi-Fi hotspots.  Wi-Fi Now automatically connects your device to select public and amenity Wi-Fi hotspots and helps you save on mobile data usage. Additionally, Wi-Fi Now tests the hotspots for functionality and will only connect to quality hotspots. Once set-up, Wi-Fi Now operates in the background â no user action is required. Wi-Fi Now makes connecting to Wi-Fi networks convenient and easy. Wi-Fi Now adds to the native Android connection managerâs capability by identifying which hotspots to connect to and, more importantly, how to connect to them.  For example, many public hotspots require a user to launch their device browser and tap on an âacceptâ button (or other manual steps) on a web page before they get a working Wi-Fi connection. Wi-Fi Now takes care of these steps automatically for millions of qualified public and amenity Wi-Fi hotspots.Wi-Fi Now is designed to have negligible impact on battery life when compared to an equivalent device that has Wi-Fi enabled.  If you notice a change, it may be because your data consumption is increasing and/or because the screen is enabled more often. Using Wi-Fi Now ensures the maximum benefit can be obtained from having Wi-Fi enabled and is strongly recommended.To learn more about Wi-Fi Now and how we have addressed many of the questions and requests in the User Review section of Google Play, please see the following URL:  www.uscellular.com/smartphones/apps/wifinow.htmlNot compatible with the following devices:â¢ Samsung Acclaimâ¢ HTC Desireâ¢ LG Apexâ¢ LG Optimusâ¢ LG Genesisâ¢ Samsung i100 â Gem

reviews.title: Junk
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work anywhere but home. This is just a way for US Cellular to run up data plans. By far the most worthless app ever, wish I could uninstall it.
reviews.author: Vanessa Daniels

reviews.title: Unsecure
reviews.comment: I like the idea of being able to reduce data usage, but automatically connecting to any open wi-fi is a terrible idea. The worst thing is even after stopping this app and disabling it, somehow it starts itself back up again and I will randomly find myself connected to public, untrusted networks. Can\'t uninstall from my Galaxy S4 either. Bloatware. Awful.
reviews.author: Kevin Hill

reviews.title: Not needed but works
reviews.comment: Works just fine on my phone all the whiners either don\'t realize you can disable the App, which also tells me they probably don\'t have it setup correctly, but app works
reviews.author: Willy Leinweber

reviews.title: The app needs upgrade.
reviews.comment: The old app worked.  This one only occasionally. Are you reading these comments U S Cellular?  Fix it or apply me to remove it.
reviews.author: C Hann

reviews.title: Worthless
reviews.comment: Only works about half the time. Waste of space on my phone. US Cellular needs to stop forcing worthless apps.
reviews.author: Jenny Hayes

reviews.comment: Hate hate hate it. Won\'t work at my work and cannot uninstall
reviews.author: Leslie Lane

reviews.title: Sg3
reviews.comment: Works good here
reviews.author: Mikey Bruss

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Terrible app.
reviews.author: Tom Anfinson

reviews.comment: Once updated cannot connect to open wi network at work. Super bogus. Wish I could go back to original version. Wish I could uninstall and delete!
reviews.author: Mike Lopez

reviews.title: Kind of dumb
reviews.comment: Not exactly sure what this app does that the phone doesn\'t already do.  It certainly doesn\'t auto connect to home network every time. . it has a nice little green icon that I guess reminds me that my wifi is connected. .. other than that, it really doesn\'t do much.
reviews.author: Joe Suelter

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Works good, it crashes every once in a blue moon, its good.
reviews.author: Kamara Intesi\303\255

reviews.title: Problems
reviews.comment: Just updated this app and now my wifi keeps cutting out by itself. this has happened on my Galaxy S3 before, and it usually fixes itself eventually. I don\'t know if this app actually causes it, but it\'s annoying.
reviews.author: Ryan Thorne

reviews.title: Unnecessary Bloatware
reviews.comment: Please make this software optional. I have no need for this application.
reviews.author: Burton Wilcox Jr.

reviews.title: DO NOT INSTALL
reviews.comment: This thing is a piece of crap. I ended up having to go through my phone while it was hooked up to the computer and searching for devicescape and had to delete it from my phone and then find it on my phone and choose to uninstall updates so it would complete remove itself from my phone. This little annoying app would keep my phone from connecting to any wifi at all. I couldn\'t log into facebook or anything. Hate it! Even the sales man at US Cellular says he hates it.
reviews.author: Jennifer Flinn

reviews.title: Pointles
reviews.comment: Dumb.  Can\'t uninstall. Even when I disable the app, and my phone is turned off or rebooted, I have to remember to go back and disable the app again.
reviews.author: Rob Greenhalgh

reviews.title: It works, but...
reviews.comment: Connects automatically, quickly, solidly and reliably with my encryted and firewalled home wi-fi router. Unfortunately, it does the same with every unsecured public hotspot I approach. I must remember to disable wi-fi whenever I go out or kiss goodbye even the illusion of security. We paranoids have enemies too! Lastly, there is no way to disable this app and I must go through the hassle of rooting my phone if I want to actually get rid of the g**damned thing!
reviews.author: William Irving

reviews.title: Contradiction
reviews.comment: It says free service but when I try it says I need to subscribe and pay $20 a month I find that contradicting.
reviews.author: Terron McLean

reviews.title: Junk
reviews.comment: Keeps messing up my WiFi, and I can\'t completely uninstall it
reviews.author: Eric Leek

reviews.title: A law suit waiting to happen
reviews.comment: This app, that I cannot remove without rooting, has single-handedly caused me to want to leave U.S. Cellular. It enables itself without my permission repeatedly, despite me explicitly disabling it. It connects to public Wi-Fi networks without my consent and sometimes without my knowledge, if I don\'t happen to notice. Suddenly my private passwords and data are available to anyone who knows how to Google, and this is absolutely criminal.
reviews.author: Jimmy Lela

reviews.title: Wifi won\'t work since update!
reviews.comment: My wifi won\'t work since uodate. Not very happy. They better get this fixed and quick
reviews.author: Cassidy Mcknight
